entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm.
